comment.author: 8293801@N07
comment._content: I wonder what became of them ... did they spend their lives working for the same company? Did they leave to get a better paid job elsewhere? Did they even survive to old age or did they expire in an industrial accident?

comment.author: 85602916@N05
comment._content: I wish I knew the names of these.  I pastored a church in Belton for five years.
